7065.quoteText: This Privacy Policy sets out how and why IKEA North America Services, LLC (“IKEA”, “we,” “our,” or “us”) collect, store, process and share your personal information.
7065.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

7068.quoteText: With your permission, we may also collect your precise location data.
7068.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

tosdr.case: This service may collect, use, and share location data

7070.quoteText: Third parties may also provide us with additional publicly available information about you.
7070.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

tosdr.case: Information is gathered about you through third parties

7071.quoteText: We therefore do not respond to browser Do Not Track signals.
7071.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.

7073.quoteText: We do not sell personal information to third parties.
7073.title: This service does not sell your personal data

tosdr.case: Your personal data is not sold

7075.quoteText: We also disclose non-private, deidentified, aggregate or otherwise non-personal information with third parties, including social media companies like Facebook and Twitter, and online advertising companies like Google, to deliver targeted advertising about other products and services for marketing purposes.
7075.title: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

tosdr.case: Only aggregate data is given to third parties

7076.quoteText: We do not knowingly allow children to order our products, communicate with us, or use any of our online services.
7076.title: This service is only available to users of a certain age

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users over a certain age

7077.quoteText: ou may opt-out of receiving marketing messages by using the opt-out mechanisms and links provided in each message.
7077.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

22567.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels and device fingerprinting

tosdr.case: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

22568.quoteText:
Information you provide to us

You may provide the following information to us in our stores and online:

  • Personal and contact information, such as name, date of birth, email address, mobile/landline telephone number, home address, age, and gender
  • IKEA FAMILY card number
  • Payment information, such as credit card information and billing address
  • Purchasing activity, product preferences, reasons for purchasing a product, family and lifestyle
  • Information you post: If you comment or otherwise provide information in a public space on one of our websites, we collect a record of it and any personal information included in the comment.
22568.title: Many different types of personal data are collected

tosdr.case: Many different types of personal data are collected

22570.quoteText:
We may collect the following information:

  • Internet Protocol (IP) address
22570.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

tosdr.case: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

22586.quoteText: DATA PORTABILITY RIGHTS FOR CALIFORNIA RESIDENTS
22586.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

22587.quoteText:
To exercise the access, data portability, and deletion rights described above, California residents may submit a verifiable consumer request to us by either:

  • Calling us at 1-888-888-4532
  • Submitting an online request here
  • Requesting a submission card in-person at one of our California stores.
